neuralprocesses.util module¶

neuralprocesses.util.is_nonempty(x)[source]¶

Check if a tensor is not empty.

Parameters

x (tensor) – Tensor.

Returns

True if x is not empty, otherwise False.

Return type

bool

Registered models.
